bm::id64_t  digest 
)
inline

Build partial XOR product of 2 bit-blocks using digest mask.

Parameters
target_block- target := block ^ xor_block
block- arg1
xor_block- arg2
digest- mask for each block wave to XOR (1) or just copy (0)
